Hi! I've learned Python as a freshman to [fix some subtitles](https://github.com/tkarabela/pysubs2) and now I use it to develop tools for industrial R&D and engineering.

You will find my open-source projects and scribbles here. I'm interested in visualization, data processing, efficient and robust software, good user experience, and sharing whatever little knowledge I have.

__Languages__

<p>
    <a href="https://www.python.org/"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-Python-white?style=for-the-badge&logo=python" alt="Python"></a>

</p>
